name: Khichdi
instructions: Wash rice and dal.
Pressure cook with 3 cups water, turmeric, and salt.
Prepare tadka with ghee and cumin, add to khichdi.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Easily digestible, grounding yet light, perfect for detoxification

name: Oats Porridge with Fruits

ingredients.name: Milk (or almond milk)
ingredients.note: Cooling or neutral depending on type

instructions: Boil oats in milk until soft.
Top with chopped fruits and cinnamon.
Serve warm.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Nourishing and grounding, provides sustained energy

name: Vegetable Upma
instructions: Roast semolina until light golden.
Cook vegetables in water with salt.
Add semolina slowly, stir until thickened.
Top with ghee.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Light yet satisfying, easily digestible breakfast option

name: Mung Bean Soup
instructions: Soak mung beans for 4 hours.
Cook until soft with turmeric and salt.
Prepare tadka with cumin and ginger, add to soup.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Perfect detox food, light yet protein-rich

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan.
Add vegetables and stir-fry quickly.
Season with soy sauce and serve warm.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Light, easy to digest, metabolism boosting

name: Masoor Dal (Red Lentil Curry)
instructions: Wash and cook lentils with turmeric until soft.
Prepare tadka with onion, tomato, cumin.
Mix into dal and simmer 5 minutes.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Protein-rich, warming, can increase Pitta if consumed excessively

name: Lassi (Sweet Yogurt Drink)
instructions: Blend yogurt with water until smooth.
Add sugar and cardamom powder.
Serve chilled (not ice-cold).

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Cooling, nourishing, excellent for Pitta conditions

name: Vegetable Pulao
instructions: Soak rice for 20 minutes.
Sauté spices and vegetables in ghee.
Add rice and water, cook until fluffy.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Aromatic, nourishing, balanced one-pot meal

name: Lentil Salad with Lemon Dressing
instructions: Cook lentils until soft but not mushy.
Mix with chopped vegetables.
Add lemon juice, olive oil, and salt.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Light, refreshing, but lemon and tomato may aggravate Pitta

name: Kheer (Rice Pudding)
instructions: Cook rice in milk until soft.
Add sugar, cardamom, and nuts.
Simmer until creamy.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Rich, nourishing, comfort food that builds Ojas

name: Palak Paneer

ingredients.name: Spinach (Palak)
ingredients.note: Cooling, balances Pitta, rich in iron

instructions: Blanch spinach and puree.
Sauté cumin, ginger, and garlic in ghee.
Add paneer cubes and cook lightly.
Mix spinach puree, add salt and spices.
Simmer until creamy and serve hot.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Rich, cooling dish that balances Pitta but can increase Kapha due to paneer

health_benefits: Rich source of calcium and iron

name: Masoor Dal Curry
instructions: Wash and pressure cook lentils until soft.
In ghee, sauté cumin, turmeric, and chopped tomatoes.
Add cooked lentils, salt, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with coriander leaves.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Light yet nourishing protein source that strengthens without heaviness

name: Curd Rice
instructions: Mix cooled cooked rice with curd.
In ghee, temper mustard seeds and curry leaves.
Pour seasoning over rice-curd mixture.
Serve with pickle or papad.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Excellent cooling meal for hot weather but can aggravate Vata in cold conditions

name: Vegetable Daliya (Broken Wheat Porridge)
instructions: Roast daliya lightly in ghee.
Add vegetables, water, and spices.
Pressure cook until soft.
Serve warm with fresh coriander.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: High fiber content makes it excellent for weight management and Kapha balance

health_benefits: Balances Kapha and supports weight management

name: Tomato Rasam
instructions: Boil tomatoes and tamarind pulp in water.
Add spices (pepper, cumin) and curry leaves.
Simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot as soup or with rice.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Excellent digestive stimulant that clears congestion and improves appetite

name: Lemon Rice
instructions: Mix cooled cooked rice with lemon juice and salt.
In ghee, temper mustard seeds, curry leaves, and chilies.
Mix seasoning into rice and serve.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Refreshing summer meal that's light yet satisfying with digestive spices

name: Oats Vegetable Chilla
instructions: Mix oats flour with water and spices into a batter.
Add grated vegetables.
Pour onto a hot pan, cook both sides like a pancake.
Serve with chutney.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: High fiber breakfast that's filling yet light, excellent for weight management

health_benefits: High in fiber, good for digestion

name: Moong Dal Chilla
instructions: Soak moong dal for 4 hours, grind into a batter.
Mix with onion, coriander, chili, and ginger.
Cook on a hot pan until golden on both sides.
Serve hot with chutney.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Perfect protein-rich breakfast that's light and easily digestible

health_benefits: Supports weight management and muscle repair

name: Quinoa Vegetable Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa until fluffy.
Sauté vegetables lightly in olive oil.
Mix with quinoa, season with lemon and herbs.
Serve warm as a balanced lunch/dinner.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Light, nourishing, and balancing meal

health_benefits: Balances Kapha, good for weight management

name: Avocado Toast with Seeds

ingredients.name: Avocado
ingredients.note: Snigdha, balances Vata, may increase Kapha

instructions: Toast bread slices.
Mash avocado with lemon juice and seasonings.
Spread on toast, sprinkle seeds.
Serve as a quick breakfast/snack.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Nourishing with healthy fats and grounding qualities

health_benefits: Rich in healthy fats and fiber
Good breakfast for Vata and Pitta

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer yogurt, fruits, and granola in a glass.
Drizzle with honey.
Serve chilled as a breakfast or snack.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Cooling and nourishing with probiotic benefits

name: Quinoa Vegetable Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa until fluffy.
Sauté vegetables lightly in olive oil.
Mix with quinoa, season with lemon and herbs.
Serve warm as a balanced lunch/dinner.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: High protein, gluten-free grain that provides sustained energy

health_benefits: Balances Kapha, good for weight management

name: Avocado Toast with Seeds

ingredients.name: Avocado
ingredients.note: Snigdha, balances Vata, may increase Kapha

instructions: Toast bread slices.
Mash avocado with lemon juice and seasonings.
Spread on toast, sprinkle seeds.
Serve as a quick breakfast/snack.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Rich in healthy fats that nourish tissues and support hormone production

health_benefits: Rich in healthy fats and fiber
Good breakfast for Vata and Pitta

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer yogurt, fruits, and granola in a glass.
Drizzle with honey.
Serve chilled as a breakfast or snack.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Cooling and nourishing, excellent for supporting digestive health

name: Vegetable Sushi Rolls
instructions: Cook sushi rice and season lightly.
Spread rice over nori, add vegetables.
Roll tightly and slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce if desired.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Light and cooling, rich in sea minerals

health_benefits: Rich in iodine and trace minerals

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Cook lentils until soft.
Blend lightly for creaminess.
Sauté onion, garlic, cumin in olive oil, add to soup.
Finish with lemon juice.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Easily digestible protein source that builds strength without heaviness

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
instructions: Sauté tofu cubes until golden.
Add vegetables and stir-fry with ginger.
Add soy sauce and sesame oil, cook lightly.
Serve hot with rice or quinoa.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Cooling protein that supports tissue building and hormone balance

name: Vegetable Minestrone Soup
instructions: Cook beans and pasta until soft.
Add vegetables and simmer in broth.
Season with olive oil and herbs.
Serve warm.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Warming and nourishing without being overly heavy

name: Vegetable Buddha Bowl
instructions: Cook brown rice until fluffy.
Arrange rice, chickpeas, and greens in a bowl.
Top with tahini dressing.
Serve warm.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Complete meal providing all macronutrients in balanced proportions

name: Vegetable Roti Wrap
instructions: Prepare whole wheat rotis.
Stuff with paneer/tofu and vegetables.
Add mint chutney.
Roll and serve as lunch/dinner.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Satisfying portable meal that provides sustained energy

name: Vegetable Oats Porridge
instructions: Cook oats with milk until creamy.
Add vegetables and cook until soft.
Finish with ghee and mild spices.
Serve warm as a breakfast.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Nourishing breakfast that provides sustained energy throughout the morning

health_benefits: Rich in beta-glucan for heart health

name: Poha
instructions: Wash poha and drain.
Sauté onion, curry leaves, chili.
Add poha, peanuts, cook lightly.
Finish with lemon juice.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Easily digestible rice preparation that's light yet satisfying

health_benefits: Rich in carbohydrates for quick energy

name: Vegetable Biryani
instructions: Cook rice with whole spices.
Layer with sautéed vegetables and ghee.
Steam until flavors combine.
Serve with raita.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Aromatic spiced rice that provides deep satisfaction and nourishment

name: Vegetable Hakka Noodles
instructions: Boil noodles until soft.
Stir-fry vegetables with sauces.
Toss noodles and sesame oil.
Serve hot.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Rich and satisfying but can be heavy for digestion

name: Chickpea Salad
instructions: Mix chickpeas with vegetables.
Add olive oil, lemon juice, parsley.
Toss and serve chilled.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Cooling and grounding, excellent for hot weather

name: Vegetable Clear Soup
instructions: Boil vegetables until tender.
Add ginger, garlic, soy sauce.
Simmer briefly and serve hot.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Very light and easily digestible, perfect for cleansing

name: Falafel Wrap
instructions: Warm pita bread.
Stuff with falafel, vegetables, tahini sauce.
Roll into wrap and serve.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Satisfying and nourishing, good for building strength

name: Vegetable Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs with salt and pepper.
Add vegetables and cook in ghee/oil.
Fold into omelette.
Serve hot.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Rich in complete proteins and essential amino acids

health_benefits: Rich in B vitamins and choline

name: Vegetable Pasta in Tomato Sauce
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente.
Prepare tomato sauce with vegetables.
Mix pasta with sauce and olive oil.
Serve warm.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Satisfying and comforting, but can increase acidity

health_benefits: Rich in fiber and plant nutrients

name: Millet Coconut Pancakes
instructions: Mix millet flour with water to form smooth batter.
Add grated coconut, jaggery, and cardamom.
Cook on medium heat like pancakes until golden.
Serve warm with honey or ghee.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Nourishing and grounding, provides sustained energy

name: Amaranth Leaf Curry
instructions: Clean and chop amaranth leaves finely.
Heat coconut oil, add mustard seeds and red chilies.
Add chopped leaves, sauté until wilted.
Season with salt and serve with rice.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Detoxifying and light, excellent for cleansing

health_benefits: High in folate and vitamin C

name: Barley Vegetable Risotto
instructions: Soak barley for 2 hours, then cook until tender.
Sauté vegetables in ghee until soft.
Mix cooked barley with vegetables.
Garnish with fresh herbs and serve warm.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Filling and cooling, good for Pitta constitution

name: Drumstick Leaves Smoothie
instructions: Wash drumstick leaves thoroughly.
Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Strain if desired for smoother texture.
Serve immediately for best nutrition.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Energizing and cleansing, boosts vitality

health_benefits: Extremely high in vitamins and minerals

name: Sweet Potato Halwa
instructions: Steam and mash sweet potatoes until smooth.
Cook mashed sweet potato in almond milk.
Add ghee and saffron, cook until thick.
Serve warm or chilled as desired.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Deeply nourishing and satisfying, builds Ojas

name: Black Sesame Laddu
instructions: Dry roast sesame seeds until fragrant.
Powder the roasted seeds in a blender.
Mix with jaggery, ghee, and cardamom.
Form into small balls and let set.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Dense nutrition, builds strength and supports bones

name: Bottle Gourd Kofta Curry
instructions: Mix grated gourd with besan and spices.
Form small balls and steam for 15 minutes.
Prepare curry base with yogurt and spices.
Add steamed koftas to curry and simmer.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Light yet satisfying, cooling and digestive

health_benefits: Low in calories, high in water content

name: Fenugreek Seed Tea
instructions: Soak fenugreek seeds overnight.
Boil soaked seeds with ginger for 10 minutes.
Strain and add lemon juice.
Add honey when tea cools to drinking temperature.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Cleansing and warming, boosts metabolism

name: Jackfruit Seed Curry
instructions: Boil jackfruit seeds until tender, remove skin.
Heat oil, add curry leaves and turmeric.
Add boiled seeds and sauté lightly.
Pour coconut milk, simmer until thick.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Substantial and nourishing, builds body tissues

name: Buckwheat Dosa
instructions: Mix buckwheat flour with yogurt and water.
Add chilies, ginger, salt and ferment 4-6 hours.
Cook thin crepes on hot griddle with oil.
Serve with coconut chutney or sambar.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Light and warming, good for Kapha constitution

name: Lotus Root Stir-Fry
instructions: Slice lotus root into rounds, soak in water.
Heat sesame oil, add five-spice powder.
Stir-fry lotus root until crisp-tender.
Add vinegar and seasonings, toss well.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Cleansing and cooling, good for excess Pitta

health_benefits: Rich in vitamin C and potassium
Low in calories, high in fiber

name: Ashwagandha Moon Milk
instructions: Warm almond milk gently, don't boil.
Whisk in ashwagandha and turmeric powders.
Let cool to drinking temperature.
Add honey and stir well before serving.

ayurvedic_properties.guna_properties: Deeply nourishing and calming, builds Ojas
